statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%medication%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_data;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patient_data;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patient_data;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data OFFSET 5 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age < 30 AND disease_diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis LIKE '%hypertension%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_data
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patient_data
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis = 'Diabetes' AND age > 50
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_female_patients FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND disease_diagnosis = 'Asthma'
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis = 'COVID-19'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NOT NULL AND age < 40
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_data WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%'
SELECT patient_name, age, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis = 'Cancer' OR disease_diagnosis = 'Leukemia'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE patient_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis IS NULL
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE age >= 60
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis IN ('Heart Disease', 'Stroke')
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM treatments;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_date FROM treatments;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, duration_days FROM treatments;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 18;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age >= 40 AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 30 OR gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE duration_days >= 7;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(age) FROM patients;
SELECT SUM(cost) FROM treatments;
SELECT MIN(age) FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT MAX(cost) FROM treatments;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, treatment_date, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 40
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE duration_days >= 5
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, duration_days FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, t.cost FROM patients p JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.cost < 500
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, t.duration_days FROM patients p JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE p.age BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT patient_name, MAX(cost) AS max_cost FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients GROUP BY gender
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost, DATE_FORMAT(treatment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT treatment_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM treatments GROUP BY treatment_name
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, duration_days, cost FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE duration_days > 7 AND cost > 500
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT diagnosis) AS unique_diagnoses FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), treatment_date) AS days_since_treatment FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM treatments;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients;
SELECT treatment_name, duration_in_days FROM treatments;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatments WHERE duration_in_days >= 7;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN treatments ON appointments.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date = '2023-01-15';

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-15' AND appointment_date <= '2023-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_treatments FROM treatments;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients;
SELECT MAX(duration_in_days) AS longest_duration FROM treatments;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, duration_in_days FROM treatments ORDER BY duration_in_days ASC;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE age < 30;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, treatment_description FROM appointments JOIN treatments ON appointments.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_description FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN treatments ON appointments.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE diagnosis NOT LIKE '%cancer%';

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE treatment_id IN (SELECT treatment_id FROM treatments WHERE duration_in_days > 10);

SELECT patient_name, gender, treatment_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN treatments ON appointments.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%' UNION SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Johnson%';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients LEFT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients RIGHT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, a.appointment_date, a.appointment_time FROM patients p INNER JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Treatments;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM Doctors WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT diagnosis, date_recorded FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON MedicalRecords.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, date_recorded FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_name, cost FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON MedicalRecords.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT MAX(cost) AS max_cost FROM Treatments;
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT specialization, AVG(years_of_experience) AS avg_experience FROM Doctors GROUP BY specialization;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(date_recorded) AS first_visit FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT treatment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Treatments JOIN MedicalRecords ON Treatments.treatment_id = MedicalRecords.treatment_id GROUP BY treatment_name;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(date_recorded) AS first_visit FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalrecordS.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY first_visit ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, treatment_name FROM Doctors d JOIN Treatments t ON d.specialization = t.effectiveness;
SELECT patient_name, date_recorded, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON mr.treatment_id = t.treatment_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Doctors d JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON d.doctor_id = mr.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name, specialization;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM MedicalRecords mr JOIN Patients p ON mr.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON mr.treatment_id = t.treatment_id;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Doctors d JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON d.doctor_id = mr.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT MAX(cost) AS max_cost FROM Treatments;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Patients;
SELECT DISTINCT(specialization) FROM Doctors;
SELECT treatment_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM Treatments GROUP BY treatment_name;

SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, treatment_name, date_recorded FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON mr.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE age > 30 AND date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, AVG(years_of_experience) AS avg_exp FROM Doctors GROUP BY specialization HAVING AVG(years_of_experience) > 5;

SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON mr.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE age < 18 or age > 60;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Doctors d JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON d.doctor_id = mr.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis, date_recorded FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, city FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Diseases;
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, severity, affected_organ FROM Diseases;
SELECT * FROM Treatments;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, description, effectiveness_rating FROM Treatments;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, treatment_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments;
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE hospital_name='General Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, city FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, severity FROM Diseases WHERE affected_organ='Lungs';
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM Treatments WHERE effectiveness_rating > 8;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT patient_name, city FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(age), MAX(age), MIN(age) FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT disease_name, severity FROM Diseases WHERE severity = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE effectiveness_rating > 8;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE hospital_name = 'General Hospital';
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Diseases.disease_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled');
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Completed');
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30');
SELECT disease_name, severity FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id IN (SELECT disease_id FROM Treatments WHERE effectiveness_rating > 9);
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Appointments WHERE treatment_id IN (SELECT treatment_id FROM Treatments WHERE effectiveness_rating > 8));
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = (SELECT doctor_id FROM Appointments GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5);

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id JOIN Diseases ON Treatments.treatment_id = Diseases.disease_id;

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN (Appointments JOIN (Treatments JOIN Diseases ON Treatments.treatment_id = Diseases.disease_id) ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, disease_name FROM Doctors JOIN (Appointments JOIN (Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id) ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, disease_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN (Appointments JOIN (Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id) ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, disease_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN (Appointments JOIN (Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, disease_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN (Appointments JOIN (Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
